name: Quantum Catacombs (GMTK Game Jam 2020)
description:
Welcome to the Quantum Catacombs!

Wind your way through ever changing corridors in search of treasure!

Dark parts of the dungeon will change with every step, lock down your path with a trail of candles! 

And be careful, don't let your lamp go out!

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.
